com.anand.sudoku.solver.algorithm

Class Solver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anand.sudoku.solver.algorithm.Solver

  • public class Solver
extends java.lang.Object
    The Solver class solves the SudokuBoard using backtracking method. The Algorithm:
    1. An Empty Cells is found (cell with 0 as value)
    2. Find all possible values for the cell
    3. Try Each possible value one by one and for each value repeat from step 1.
    4. If not value is possible then set the value of cell as 0 and backtrack.
    Author:
    A Anand

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public Solver initialize(java.lang.String sudokuData,
                         int row,
                         int innerRow,
                         int innerColumn)
        This method initializes the Solver class. Using the sudokuData a SudokuBoard to be solved.
        Parameters:
        sudokuData - the sudoku puzzle board data. Each cell should be separated by a single space
        row - the size of the sudoku board
        innerRow - the row size of a single inner box
        innerColumn - the column size of a single inner box
        Returns:
        an Initialized instance of Solver class

      • solve

        public boolean solve(int solutionType)
              throws BoardNotInitializedException
        This method solves and displays the solution for the sudoku board. The type of solution could be
        1. SolverConstants.SINGLE_SOLUTION
        2. SolverConstants.ALL_SOLUTIONS
        This method also displays the time elapsed to solve the puzzle in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        solutionType - the type of the solution required
        Returns:
        whether the board is solved or not.
        Throws:
        BoardNotInitializedException - if the SudokuBoard is not initialzed before attempting to solve the puzzle

      • doSolveOneSolution

        private boolean doSolveOneSolution(SudokuBoard sudokuBoard)
        This method reccursively applies backtracking method to solve the SudokuBoard. Once a solution is obtained the method terminated immediately displaying the obtained solution.
        Parameters:
        sudokuBoard - the SudokuBoard to be solved
        Returns:
        true if the SudokuBoard is solved, otherwise returns false

      • doSolveAllPossibleSolutions

        private boolean doSolveAllPossibleSolutions(SudokuBoard sudokuBoard)
        This method reccursively applies backtracking method to solve the SudokuBoard. Once a solutions is obtained the solution will be displayed and the method continues to find other solutions if they exits.
        Parameters:
        sudokuBoard - the SudokuBoard to be solved
        Returns:
        true if the SudokuBoard is solved, otherwise returns false
